TextView.android:text: Movie Map is a fun app for San Francisco lovers which shows about the movies shot in San Francisco. It also shows the location of movies shootings on google map\n
Movie Map uses the data given on data.sfgov.org\n

It also uses external apis like TMDb api to fetch details about movie so there may be a case where any data about that detail is not fetched so that field is marked as N/A, also when locations are not known, the locations button is disabled
